m_szDocTitle: Patent US20110143173 - Metal Oxygen Battery Containing Oxygen Storage Materials - Google Patents
m_szDocSumamry: Metal Oxygen Battery Containing Oxygen Storage Materials US 20110143173 A1 Abstract A battery system includes a metal oxygen battery. The metal oxygen battery includes a first electrode, an oxygen storage material, and a selective transport member separating the oxygen storage material and the first electrode. Images(5) Claims(20) 1. A battery system comprising: a metal oxygen battery including a first electrode, an oxygen storage material, and a selective transport member separating the first electrode and the oxygen storage material, wherein the selective transport member is in oxygen commun
